MTGPQ 2.3.0!
Booster Crafting has arrived!
- Take your duplicate cards and convert them into fully customizeable packs to craft for any rarity and any set in MTGPQ.
Special Holiday and Anniversary Content including:
- Special Events
- Uni

MTGPQ 2.6.0!

- 1 Free Dominaria card for all players!

- 1 Free Dominaria card for all players!

MTGPQ 2.7.0!
Dominaria is here, featuring:
- 192 new cards + introducing Saga cards!
- New Planeswalkers!
- Dominaria story and versus events!
- Free packs now feature 3 free cards every 6 hours!
- Card balance and functionality fixes.

MTGPQ 2.7.0!
Dominaria is here, featuring:
- 192 new cards + introducing Saga cards!
- New Planeswalkers!
- Dominaria story and versus events!
- Free packs now feature 3 free cards every 6 hours!
- Card balance and functionality fixes.

MTGPQ 2.7.1!
New Journey Through History event featuring Dominaria content!
Dominaria added to Booster crafting.
- Card balance and functionality fixes.
- Bug Fixes.
For full update notes in English, please visit d3go.com.

MTGPQ 3.2.0!
New Player Profile feature is now live!
- Select your Avatar, choose a title, increase player levels for great rewards, view other player profiles, and more to come!
New Content:
- New Planeswalker - Sarkhan Unbroken
- New Ev

MTGPQ 3.2.0!

- Select your Avatar, choose a title, increase player levels for great rewards, view other player profiles, and more to come!
New Content:
- New Planeswalker - Sarkhan Unbroken
- New Ev

MTGPQ 3.3.0!
Welcome Ravnica Allegiance with the following new content:
- 200 new cards!
- 3 New Planeswalkers
- New Events
- Select your Favorite Deck before battles.
- View exiled cards via the Exile tab in the hand.
- Card balance

MTGPQ

War of the Spark is here! Over 200 brand new cards, the latest content, Planeswalkers, events, and more!

War of the Spark features 3 new mechanics, Amass, Partner and Proliferate, and 1 new card subtype, the Vanguard supports.

- Card balance

War of the Spark is here! Over 200 brand new cards, the latest content, Planeswalkers, events, and more!

War of the Spark features 3 new mechanics, Amass, Partner and Proliferate, and 1 new card subtype, the Vanguard supports.

- Card balance

War of the Spark continues in Magic: Puzzle Quest with all-new Planeswalkers, events, and exclusive bundles.

Keep “one” eye out for Fblthp! Try and catch him for special treasures!

The Elderspark Coalition Event begins on July 19th!
